I was wondering if someone could help me out with this mei:
http://www.nihontophile.com/GendaiMei.jpg
The date isn't a problem but the signature is giving me fits.
It begins Oite and the maker is Katsunori (unknown Gendai smith?) 
but while I can read a few of the other characters, I just cannot 
put it together...

Thanks for the help!
Ron
